Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but we hope this proposal will be agreeable to both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
